scripts.build: mkdirp ./.tmp/dist/js/ && mkdirp ./.tmp/dist/js/foo/ && browserify -t coffeeify ./source/coffee/common.coffee > ./.tmp/dist/js/common.js && browserify -t coffeeify ./source/coffee/index.coffee > ./.tmp/dist/js/index.js && browserify -t coffeeify ./source/coffee/foo/index.coffee > ./.tmp/dist/js/foo/index.js
